name: CJC-1295-DAC
overview: A modified growth hormone-releasing hormone (GHRH) analog with an added Drug Affinity Complex (DAC) that extends its half-life. This allows for less frequent dosing compared to standard CJC-1295.
interactions_notes: May affect glucose metabolism and insulin sensitivity. Can interact with diabetes medications, thyroid medications, and corticosteroids. Comprehensive medication review with clinician required.
dosing_ranges_literature: Research protocols have used doses ranging from 0.5-2 mg administered once or twice weekly due to extended half-life from DAC modification.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution with bacteriostatic water, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks.

references.title: Modified GRF(1-29) with extended half-life
references.note: Study on DAC technology and extended peptide half-life.

references.title: Growth hormone releasing peptides in aging
references.note: Overview of GHRH analogs and their clinical applications.
